casebody.data:
STATE
v.
James H. TERRELL, Jr. 55A18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 23, 2018

Elizabeth J. Weese, Assistant Attorney General.

G. Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender, James Howard Terrell, Jr., Michele A. Goldman, Attorney at Law, for Terrell, James Howard (Jr.) Derrick Mertz, Assistant Attorney General, Ernie Lee, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd of February 2018 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 23rd of February 2018."
